atra vṛddhirādaic 1-1-1 itivat sānandam iti maṅgalaśabdopakramānnandinaḥ parameśvaramūrtibhedasya tadāhatamuravoktisāmarthyāgūritanaṭanāṭyākṣiptasya parameśvarasya kaumāreti prastutasya kumārasya prādhānyena padyapratipādyasya vināyakasya cānusandhānāt sahṛdayānuddiśya cāśīrvacanād abhimatārthasiddhaye mahākavinā paramaṃ maṅgalaṃ prayuktam iti veditavyam |
na ca mantavyaṃ nāsāgrarandhrapraveśaprasaṅgato bhujaṅgapater amaṅgalabhūtaṃ mataṅgajamukhasya kimapi vyasanam ādau kavinā sūcitam iti |
tatprasaṅgopādhinā bhagavato vināyakasya lokottareṇa rūpeṇa varṇitatvāt tatraiva ca tātparyāt |
lakṣayojanonnater amarorvībhṛtaḥ śarvadhanuṣo maurvīpadam anubhūya garvitasya darvīkarapateḥ praveśāya pātālagahvaram iva puṣkaravivaraṃ tāvat puṣkalam |
vadanavidhutigrahaṇena yasya kasyāpi paradevatāvyāpārasya bhaktaparirakṣaṇasāmarthyaṃ prakāśyate |
atra sānandam iti śailādeḥ śivaviṣayo bhāvo dhvanyate |
gaṇḍoḍḍīnetyādibhir akāṇḍakopatāṇḍavitena jagadaṇḍam api khaṇḍayituṃ paṇḍitasya praṇatajanaparitrāṇe kiyān prayāsa iti vastusāmarthyātiśayayogād devatāntarebhyo vyatireka iti vyatirekālaṅkāraś ca |
tataś ca trividhadhvanivyāptiṃ svaprabandhasya gandhayati kaviḥ |
pāntu vaḥ iti kaver devatāviṣayo bhāvaḥ prakāśyate |
pratyūhanirasanaucityādvināyakamukhenāśiṣaṃ prayujyādhunā sūtradhāradvārā svābhimataparadevatāmukhena tribhiḥ padyairāśiṣaṃ prayuṅkte kaviḥ — nāndyante sūtradhāraḥ cūḍāpīḍetyādi |
nāndī nāma pūrvaraṅgavidhāne pratyāhārādiprarocanāntadvāviṃśatyaṅgataraṅgite yavanikāntargatena sūtradhāreṇa maṅgalārthaṃ kartavyaḥ prayogaviśeṣaḥ |

yathoktaṃ kohalena—
devatādinamaskāramaṅgalārambhapāṭhanam |
nāṭyādau śasyate yattu sā nāndī kathitā budhaiḥ ||
iti |
nāndīśabdaśca bhaṭṭaghasyunā ṇadi stutau ityasmāt pṛṣodarāditvāt sādhitaḥ |

tathā bādarāyaṇaḥ—
yadyapyaṅgāni bhūyāṃsi pūrvaraṅgasya nāṭake |
tathāpyavaśyakartavyā nāndī vighnapraśāntaye ||
iti |

tathāha bharataḥ—
yasmādutthāpayantyādau prayogaṃ nāndipāṭhakāḥ |
tasmādutthāpanaṃ jñeyaṃ vāgaṅgavyaktikārakam ||
yasmācca lokapālānāṃ parivṛtya caturdiśam |
vandanāṃ saṃprakurvanti tasmāt syāt parivartanam ||
āśīrvacanasaṃyuktā yasmānnityaṃ bhavediha |
devadvijanṛpādīnāṃ tasmānnāndīti śabdyate ||
siddhenāmantraṇaṃ yā tu vijñeyā sā prarocanā |
siddhastrivikrame viṣṇuḥ siddhaḥ krauñcapade guhaḥ ||
ityādi |
tādṛśyā nāndyā ante avasāne nāndīsūtradhāre niṣkrānte sati sthāpakasūtradhāraḥ praviśyāhetyarthaḥ |

yathoktaṃ bharatena—
prayujya raṅgaṃ niṣkrāmet sūtradhāraḥ sahānugaḥ |
sthāpakaḥ praviśettatra sūtradhārasamākṛtiḥ ||
iti |

nāndī ca dvividhā—
pūrvaraṅge prayojyaikā sthāpanāyāmathāparā |
sā cāvaśyaṃ candranāmāṅkitā prayoktavyeti kavisampradāyaḥ |
praviṣṭaś ca sthāpakaḥ padāṣṭakaviśiṣṭām indupadamudritāṃ nāndīṃ prayuṅkte—cūḍāpīḍetyādi |

yathāha bharataḥ—
sūtradhāraḥ paṭhet tatra madhyamasvaramāśritām |
nāndīṃ padairdvādaśabhiraṣṭabhirvāpyalaṅkṛtām ||

kālayajvā niyatakālānatikrameṇa śrutismṛtivihitaiḥ karmabhirīśvaraṃ pūjayan puruṣaḥ |

yathāhur ācāryāḥ—
saṅkalpya havyaṃ sakalaprapañcaṃ prajñāsrucā sarvahutaṃ vimuktyai |
jājvalyamāne svata eva nitye sarvāntare jyotiṣi johavīmi ||
iti |

ambāstave ca—
brahmāṇḍabudbudakadambakasaṅkulo ’yaṃ māyodadhirvividhatatvataraṅgamālaḥ |
āścaryamamba jhaṭiti pralayaṃ prayāti tvaddhyānasantatimahābaḍavāmukhāgnau ||
iti |

tārtīyīkam—
anyadeva tadviditādatho aviditādadhi |
ity upaniṣannītyā māyātatkāryavyatiriktaṃ tadadhyāsādhiṣṭhānatayā tṛtīyam |

yadvā—
śaivāgameṣu mukhyaṃ patipaśupāśā iti kramāt tritayam |
ity uktakrameṇa niyāmyayoḥ paśupāśayorniyantṛtvena taduttīrṇaṃ purāreḥpuraṃ śarīraṃ bhaktānāmajñānanidānakarmamithunanirmitadehabandhanirmūlanasya madanaploṣaṇaṃ saṃsāraviṣatarubījabhūtamanmathonmathanam |

kāma eṣa krodha eṣa rajoguṇasamudbhavaḥ |
mahāśano mahāpāpmā viddhyenamiha vairiṇam ||
iti bhagavadvacanāt |

yathāhur ācāryāḥ—
mūlādhārāt sphuritataṭidāmāprabhāsūkṣmarūpo gacchantyāmastakamaṇutarā tejasāṃ mūlabhūtā |
sauṣumnādhvācaraṇanipuṇā sā savitrānubaddhā dhyātā sadyo ’mṛtamatha raveḥ srāvayet sārdhasomāt ||
iti |
atra ca jaṭānāṃ dharmaliṅgatvāddharmavṛddhisravantyūrmīṇāṃ duritaharatvādadharmanirāso locanasya jñānasvarūpatvāttatsādhyo mokṣaścāśāsita iti kramo mantavyaḥ ||
ittham āśiṣaṃ prayujyākāṇḍaprathanadoṣajanyaṃ rasavicchedakhedaṃ sahṛdayānāmāśaṅkya pariharati sūtradhāraḥ—alam ativistareṇeti |

yathāha dhvanikāraḥ—
anaucityādṛte nānyadrasabhaṅgasya kāraṇam |
prasiddhaucityabandhastu rasasyopaniṣatparā ||
iti |
prathane vāvaśabde 3-3-33 iti ghañaḥ pratiṣedhād vipūrvāt stṛñaḥ śabdaviṣaye ṝdorap 3-3-57 |
idaṃ tṛtīyāyuktaṃ prayujyate, alaṃ mahīpāla tava śrameṇa ityādidarśanāt |

atha prabhātasandhyopāsanāvasānasamuditānāṃ bhūmidevānā
mucitaṃ sevāsamayamanusandadhānaḥ svābhimatasiddhaye sūryamupatiṣṭhāsurāha — uditabhūyiṣṭha (iti) bahutaramuditaḥ |

aśeṣabhuvanadvīpadīpaḥ aśeṣāṇāṃ bhuvanaviśeṣabhūtabhūlokāvayavānāṃ jambūplakṣaśālmalīkuśakrauñcaśākapuṣkaranāmnāmantarāntarā samudrasīmantitasīmnāṃ pradeśānāṃ prakāśanāddīpa iva dīpaḥ,
ravicandramasoryāvanmayūkhairavabhāsyate |
sasamudrasaricchailā tāvatī pṛthivī smṛtā ||
iti purāṇavacanāt |
dīparūpeṇa nyūnatvaṃ ca nāśaṅkanīyam, prakāśyadeśamahattvānuguṇyena prakāśakasya dīpasyāpi mahattvopapatteḥ ||

bahuvacanena candrādigatānāmapyupasaṃgrahaḥ kriyate |
yadādityagataṃ tejo jagadbhāsayate ’khilam |
yaccandramasi yaccāgnau tattejo viddhi māmakam ||
iti | jyotiṣāṃ raviraṃśumān iti ca bhagavadvacanāt |
sa yaścāyaṃ puruṣe, yaścāsāvāditye, sa ekaḥ iti śruteḥ |
ghvasor eddhāv abhyāsalopa śca 6-4-119 ity etvam abhyāsalopaś ca |
nyāyadīpāvalyāmudāharaṇavākye yadyad dṛśyaṃ tanmithyā yathā śuktirūpyam iti vyāptigrahaṇe ubhayathāpi samarthitatvāt |
jagannātha nāthyata iti nāthaḥ, lokānāṃ prārthanīya, sakalapuruṣārthasavitṛtvāt |
kriyārthopapadasya ca karmaṇi sthāninaḥ 2-3-14 iti caturthī |
stūyamānā hi devatā vīryeṇa vardhate iti nyāyād vīryavardhanāya prasādasaumukhyāya ceti mantavyam |
atra prathamena vīryodbodhanaṃ, dvitīyenaihikaphalaprārthanā, tṛtīyena pāpakṣayāśaṃsā, caturthena tatsādhanabhūtatattvajñānaprārthanā ca vākyaiḥ kṛteti boddhavyam |

jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasātkurute tathā |
iti bhagavadvacanāt tadadhigama uttarapūrvārdhayor aśeṣavināśaśravaṇāc ca |

atra ca nāndyaṅgaṃ devatānamaskāraḥ kṛtaḥ
devatādinamaskāramaṅgalārambhapāṭhanam |
nāṭyādau kriyate yattu sā nāndī kathitā budhaiḥ ||
iti vacanāt |
nepathye miśram iti bharatokteḥ nepathye devatāvandanaṃ ca prayuktam iti mantavyam || 5 ||

avataraṇaṃ nāma madhuramaṅgalagītimukharamukhīnāṃ gāyakīnāṃ praveśaḥ taduktaṃ bharatena—
tathāvataraṇaṃ caiva gāyakīnāṃ praveśanam |
iti |

pratyāhārādikeṣu satsvapyanyeṣu pūrvaraṅgāṅgeṣvavataraṇagrahaṇaṃ prādhānyāt
geyaṃ prāṇāḥ prayogasya sarvaṃ vā geyamucyate |
geyasādhyaṃ hi dharmārthakāmamokṣacatuṣṭayam ||
iti bharatokteḥ |

tathā śārṅgadevaḥ
nṛttaṃ vādyānugaṃ proktaṃ vādyaṃ gītānubandhi ca |
ato gītaṃ pradhānatvādatrādāvabhidhīyate ||
iti |
nirdiṣṭaguṇaprabandhenety anenaitadguṇaviśiṣṭena prabandhena bhavitavyam iti pariṣanniyogam āsūtrayati |

praviśyetyukte
samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle 6-4-21 iti ktvo vidhānāt āhetyasya nāntarīyakatvena siddheḥ punaḥ pātranirdeśaḥ pramādaḥ |

sūtradhārasya naṭena saha sallāpādāmukhaṃ caitat
sūtradhāro naṭīṃ brūte māriṣaṃ vā vidūṣakam |
svakāryaprastutākṣepi citroktyā yattadāmukham ||
ity ukteḥ |

praveśāt prayogātiśaya āmukhāṅgametat |
eṣo ’ham ity apekṣāvān sūtradhāraprayogataḥ |
pātrapraveśo yatraiṣa prayogātiśayo mataḥ ||
bhāveti nāṭyoktau |

bhāvo naṭena sūtrī ca māriṣetyamunāpi ca
iti vacanān naṭaḥ sūtradhāraṃ sambodhayati |

bhagavantaḥ
utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānāmāgatiṃ gatim |
vetti vidyāmavidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti ||
uktaguṇaviśiṣṭāḥ |
bhūmidevāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ brāhmaṇagrahaṇena vedādiṣvaṣṭādaśasu vidyāsthāneṣu teṣāmeva mukhyādhikāritvāt nāṭyaprayogasya ca caturvedasāratvāt tadanusaraṇenaiva varṇāntaraiḥ draṣṭavyatvaṃ dhvanyate |

yathoktaṃ bharatena—
ṛgbhyaḥ pāṭhyamamūd gītaṃ sāmabhyaḥ samapadyata |
yajurbhyo ’bhinayā jātā rasāścāsannatharvaṇaḥ ||
iti ||
autsukyam abhilāṣavipralambhaḥ, autsukyena kṛtatvarā ityautsukyādaparigaṇayan ityādiprayogadarśanāt |
syād āyallakam autsukyam utkaṇṭhotkalikā ratiḥ iti vaijayantī |
auddhatyam iti pāṭhe manmathamūlamavinītatvam ity arthaḥ |
āyojitakāmasūtraṃ sarvatrodāharaṇatvena saṃpāditāni vātsyāyanamunipraṇītāni kāmaśāstrasūtrāṇi yatra tat |

citrā saṃvidhānacāturyeṇa vismayajananī kaviprati
bhotpāditā ca |
vācīti jātyekavacanaṃ tattatpātroktiṣu, na punaḥ kavisandarbhe, yat prauḍhitvam ityādinā tasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt |
citrā kathetyanenotpādyetivṛttatvaṃ prakaraṇalakṣaṇamanusmārito naṭaḥ pṛcchati—kasmin prakaraṇa iti |

yasminnitivṛttaṃ kavipratibhānirmitaṃ loke ’py aucityena saṃvāvadūkaṃ, nāyako vinayādisāmānyaguṇaviśiṣṭo dhīrapraśānto ’mātyavipravaṇijāmanyatamaḥ pratyūhaśabalakāryasiddhiś ca, nāyikā tu kulastrī gaṇikā vā dve eva |
anyat sarvaṃ nāṭakavat, tat prakaraṇaṃ nāma rūpakabhedaḥ |
prakṛtibhūtaṃ nāṭakalakṣaṇaṃ ca tatra tatropari yojayiṣyāmaḥ |
atra tu nāyako mādhavo nāma brāhmaṇo yuvā anukūlo dhīrapraśāntaḥ sāpāyatrivargasādhanaparaś ca |
nāyikā mālatī nāma brāhmaṇī śīlārjavādiguṇavatī mugdhāvasthā ca |
upanāyakaḥ pīṭhamardakaparyāyo nāyakāt kiñcidūnaguṇo makarando nāma pratināyako lubdhastabdhavṛddhatvādiguṇaviśiṣṭo nandano nāmetyādi veditavyam ||
vicintyeti samāhitena manasā tādṛśaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vicāryāhetyarthaḥ |

vindhyāttu dakṣiṇo deśo dakṣiṇāpathasaṃjñitaḥ |
iti vaijayantī |

taittirīyo nāma guruniyogāt yogīśvareṇa yājñavalkye
nodgīrṇo mūrtastittiribhūtaistacchiṣyairgṛhītvā jagati pravartito yajurvedaśākhāviśeṣaḥ |

yathāha murāriḥ—
yajūṃṣi taittirīyāṇi mūrtāni vamati sma yaḥ |
sa yogī yājñavalkyastvāṃ vedāntānadhyajīgapat ||
iti |
tasya śabdato ’rthataś ca gṛhītatvāt tadvantaḥ ata iniḥ taittirīyiṇa iti |

pātakisahasrasya paṅktau sthito ya ekastān sarvān punāti, sa paṅktipāvanaḥ, āsahasrāt paṅktiṃ punanti iti śruteḥ—
agryāḥ sarveṣu vedeṣu sarvapravacaneṣu ca |
śrotriyānvayajāścaiva vijñeyāḥ paṅktipāvanāḥ ||
iti manuvacanāc ca |

athavā
pañcāgnayo manuṣyeṇa paricaryāḥ prayatnataḥ |
pitā mātāgnirātmā ca guruśca bharatarṣabha ||
iti mahābhāratoktapañcāgniśuśrūṣaṇaparāḥ |

pañcāgnaya ityanena
gatārthatve'pi somapīthina iti vacanaṃ tācchīlyaṃ dyotayati |

caraṇaguravaḥ vedaśākhāviśeṣādhyāpanācāryāḥ |
na pṛcched gotracaraṇaṃ na svādhyāyaṃ na cāgamam |
iti vacanāt |

athavā
ācāro vṛttacāritracaritracaraṇāni ca |
iti vaijayantī |

laukikānāṃ svayam anuṣṭhānena sadācāropadeṣṭāraḥ |
śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ sadācāraḥ svasya ca priyamātmanaḥ |
etaccaturvidhaṃ prāhuḥ sākṣāddharmasya lakṣaṇam ||
iti manuvacanāt |
yadyadācarati śreṣṭhas tattadevetaro janaḥ |
sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokastadanuvartate ||
iti bhagavadvacanāc ca |

ṣaṇmāsamātraparyāptadhānyasaṃgrahī gṛhasthaḥ udumbara audumbaraś ca |
udumbarastu ṣaṇmāsasaṃgrahī tulyakālabhuk |
iti vaijayantī |
yadyapyekaśākhāmadhītya śrotriya iti smaryate, tathāpyatra brāhmaṇatvamātraparaḥ śrotriyaśabdaḥ |
tattvaviniścayāya īśvarayāthārthyanirṇayaṃ kartuṃ tumarthācca bhāvavacanāt 2-3-15 iti caturthī |
bahubhyaḥ śrotavyaṃ bahudhā śrotavyaṃ iti vacanāt |

na hyekasmād gurorjñānamutthitaṃ syāt supuṣkalam |
brahmaitadadvitīyaṃ vai gīyate bahudharṣibhiḥ
iti bhāgavatokteḥ |
iṣṭaṃ yāgātmakaṃ karma pūrtaṃ khātādikarma ca
iti vaijayantī |

arthān dhanāni |
ṣaṇṇāṃ tu karmaṇāmasya trīṇi karmāṇi jīvikā |
yājanādhyāpane caiva viśuddhācca pratigrahaḥ ||
iti smṛtakrameṇārjanarakṣaṇādibhiḥ |
dārāḥ puṃsi ca bhūmni ca iti pulliṅgatvaṃ nityabahuvacanāntatvaṃ ca |

apatyaṃ tokaṃ tayoḥ same iti strīpuṃsasādhāraṇo ’patyaśabdaḥ, tadartham |
striyaḥ śriyo gṛhasyoktāstasmāt pūjyā viśeṣataḥ |
iti smṛteḥ, vasanābharaṇādibhirācāraparirakṣaṇena ca |
arthena nityasamāsaḥ sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā pā. 2-1-36 iti caturthīsamāsaḥ napuṃsakatvaṃ ca |

vedābhyāsādibhirāyurvedopadeśakramānuṣṭhānena ca |
anabhyāsena vedānāmācārasya ca varjanāt |
ālasyādannadoṣāc ca mṛtyur viprān jighāṃsati ||
iti manuvacanāt |
kiñca taporthamiti dārānityarthāniti tattvaviniścayāyeti dharmakāmārthamokṣākhyapuruṣārthacatuṣṭayāvāpteḥ kṛtakṛtyatā ca dyotyate |

taporthamāyuriti ca sarvasādhāraṇam |
āyuḥ kāmayamānena dharmārthasukhasādhanam |
āyurvedopadeśeṣu vidheyaḥ paramādaraḥ ||
ity ukteḥ |
atra ca vākyacatuṣṭayena kramāt khyātyādīnāṃ draviṇalobhasya viṣayalaulyasya dehābhimānasya cārthataḥ paryudāsāt parisaṅkhyālaṅkāraḥ || 7 ||
tat yasmād evaṃ padmanagare brahmavādinaḥ prativasanti tasmāddhetoḥ |

prakhyātapitṛjāte ’patyapratyayaḥ |
prakhyātāt piturutpanna āmuṣyāyaṇa iṣyate
iti halāyudhaḥ |
tatra bhavatastasmin padmanagare sambhūtasya | vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavadvā 3. 3. 31 iti śatā, na punastatrabhavata iti pūjāvācitvena yojanīyaḥ |
śrīkaṇṭhapadalāñchanaḥ kanakapaṭṭādiniviṣṭā parameśvarapadanyāsamudrā śikhādidhṛtā lakṣaṇaṃ yasya |
tattvajñānamuṣitadevatābhedānāmapi, bhaktyā māmabhijānāti yāvānyaścāsmi tattvataḥ iti bhagavadvacanāt |
tattvajñānasya bhaktimantareṇānupapatterbhakteśca pūrvajanmavāsanāvaśāt kvacideva devatāviśeṣe sambhavādevamuktiḥ |

na punarbhedadarśitayā | dvaitino ’tathyadarśinaḥ iti |
sṛṣṭisthityantakaraṇīṃ brahmaviṣṇuśivātmikām |
sa saṃjñāṃ yāti bhagavāneka eva janārdanaḥ ||
iti bhedanindanādabhedapratipādanāc ca |
śreṣṭhaḥ paramahaṃsānām ityādinā svayaṃ paramahaṃsaparivrājakāntevāsitvakathanāt yadvedādhyayanaṃ tathopaniṣadāṃ sāṅkhyasya yogasya ca jñānam iti jñānitvokteśca |
padam iti padaśuddhyupalakṣitaṃ vyākaraṇaśāstram, vākyaṃ vākyavicāraparaṃ mīmāṃsādiśāstram, pramāṇaṃ pramāṇādipadārthalakṣaṇaparīkṣaṇavicakṣaṇamakṣapādādiśāstram, tāni jānātīti padavākyapramāṇajñaḥ |
evaṃprāyeti tādṛśānāṃ guṇāntarāṇāṃ nītiśāstrayojanādīnāmapi bāhulyaṃ sūcayati |
vāgdikpaśyadbhyo yuktidaṇḍahareṣu vā. 6. 3. 21 iti ṣaṣṭhyā aluk ||

na iti | asmado dvayośca
1. 2. 59 ityātmani bahuvacanam |
ihāvajñāṃ prathayantīty anena sannikarṣo hi martyānāma nādaraṇakāraṇam ity etad anusmārayati |

yathāha kavivallabhaḥ
saṃstutādaparijñātastasmādvaideśikaḥ kaviḥ |
tato'pi tāvat svaryāto yāti śraddheyasūktitām ||
iti |
tattāvadarvāci parvaṇi tasthuṣāmasmādṛśāṃ paricchedapadavīṃ na ḍhaukata iti bhāvaḥ |
na khalu sarve sarvatra sarvadā ta iva mahāmatayo bhavantīti niyatirityarthaḥ |

kālasya niravadhitve sati pṛthavyā vaipulyāditi hetuḥ |
anādirbhagavān kālo nānto'sya dvija vidyate
iti, pañcāśatkoṭivistīrṇā seyamurvī mahāmune iti ca viṣṇupurāṇavacanāt |
yathā bhūte kāle vipule dharaṇītale jāteṣu mandātmatayā kecinmatsadharmāṇo'pi jātāḥ śrūyante |
tān prati neti niṣedhasāmarthyādya utpatsyate taṃ pratītyarthasiddheḥ kaṃ pratītyākāṃkṣā ca pūritā bhavati |

atra ca gurucaraṇaparicaraṇavimukhānāmidānīntanānāṃ pallavagrahaṇadurlalitānāṃ kṣullakānāṃ gambhīramadhurasandarbhagarbhitarasasudhānirjharodgāriṣu sakalaśāstrārthakadambakapratibimbanamaṇimukuravimbeṣu mādṛśāṃ prabandheṣu jātyandhānāmiva ratnapravekaparīkṣaṇeṣu kutastyo'dhikāraḥ? |
aśaktāstatpadaṃ gantuṃ tato nindāṃ prakurvate
iti nyāyena asmannindaiva teṣāmasūyājvaradoṣabheṣajaṃ bhavatu |

anyaḥ punaravanyāṃ yatra kutracidyadākadācidutpanno yaḥ kaścidatiniśitamatiramalavipulavidyāvidyotitaḥ sahṛdayo maṇimiva maulimānayiṣyatyāmukhe māsamānāyāḥ stuternindātvena prarohādvyājastutiralaṅkāraḥ |
ko ’pīti sujanasya viduṣo mṛgamadasyeva durlabhatā ca dyotyate || 8 ||

yathāsvaṃ svasvavyutpattyanatikrameṇa |
nṛttaṃ gītaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca trayaṃ saṅgītamucyate
iti halāyudhaḥ |
varṇikā tattadveṣaḥ gāne gāyakāṃ vādyavādane vādakāstattadveṣasaṃgrahe ca nartakā ityarthaḥ |

tuśabdenaitadāha—utpatsyate tu mama ko ’pi samānadharmā ityuktyā sphuritasya madahaṅkārasya guruprasāda eva nidānaṃ nānyat kiñcit, ācāryavān puruṣo veda iti śruteḥ, sadgurulābhaśca sakalasampadāmuparīti samādhānaṃ kṛtamiti ||
sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sadityetat prayujyate iti sādhuvācakasya sacchabdasya saujanyādiguṇadvāreṇaiva pravṛtterguṇavanta eva santa iti sthitam |
ataḥ satāṃ guṇairna punarasmākaṃ guṇyapekṣeti bhāvaḥ |

anena guṇānāmeva paropakāraparatā naisargikīti dyotyate |
tathā hi sarve tasyāsan parārthaikaphalā guṇāḥ |
itivat |
atra hetumāha—yathārthanāmā abhidheyamanatikrāntaṃ nāma padaṃ yasya |

bhagavacchabdena paramahaṃsasannyāsitvamapi sūcayati ||
bhagavadbhir idaṃ gurubhaktiyutaiḥ paṭhitavyamapāṭhyamato'nyajanaiḥ |
ity ādyācāryavacanāt śreṣṭhaḥ paramahaṃsānām iti kavinaiva mahāvīracarite pratipāditatvācca |
jñānanidhiḥ jñānānyasmin nidhīyante ityadhikaraṇe ghoḥ kiḥ |
yathā dhanadevatā niravadhiratnādinidhānānnidhaya iti vyapadiśyante tatheti nāmapadakathanam |

sa gururyaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā vedamasmai prayacchati |
iti yājñavalkyasmaraṇāt ||
utpādakabrahmapitrorgarīyān brahmadaḥ pitā |
brahmajanma hi viprasya pretya ceha ca śāśvatam ||
iti manuvacanācca |
vedo nāma parameśvarānniśvasitavadanāyāsenāvirbhūtatvādapauruṣeyasandarbho gabhastimālivat samastapuruṣārthaprakāśako'nādirananta udāttādisvaroccāryaḥ paramapramāṇabhūtaḥ śabdarāśiḥ |

upaniṣadāṃ jīveśvaraikyaviṣayasamyakjñānapratipādanaikaparāṇāṃ vedāntānām |
yasmāc ca nirgatā vedā vedāntānyakhilāni ca
iti |
vedaiś ca sarvairahameva vedyo vedāntakṛd vedavid eva cāham
itivat |

vedaśabdenaivopasaṃgṛhītatve ’pi pṛthagupādānamantaḥkaraṇaśodhanasādhanatayā jñānāṅgabhūtakarmapratipādakāt pūrvabhāgāt paramānandarūpavidehakaivalyasādhanajñānapratipādakasyottarabhāgasyābhyarhitatvaṃ dyotayati |
sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate |
iti bhagavadvacanāt
pratyakpravaṇatāṃ buddheḥ karmāṇyutpādya śuddhitaḥ |
kṛtārthānyastamāyānti prāvṛḍante ghanā iva ||
iti śrīviśvarūpācāryavacanāc ca |

mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtiḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthārūpā cicchaktiśūnyā puruṣasya bhogamokṣārthe svata eva pravartamānā pariṇāmaparispandavyāpārā prasavadharmiṇī sakalapuruṣasādhāraṇabhogyasvarūpā ca |
puruṣas tu jñānamātrasvarūpo nirguṇo niṣkriyo niṣpariṇāmo na ca vikṛtiḥ na ca prakṛtiḥ, tasya cājñānavijñānanibandhanau bandhamokṣau |
puruṣāś ca bahavaḥ pratidehaṃ bhinnāḥ sarve sarvagatāśca |
mahānahaṃkārastanmātrāṇi ca svakāraṇaṃ prati vikṛtayaḥ svakāryaṃ prati prakṛtayaḥ ityubhayarūpāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ, ekādaśendriyāṇi pañcabhūtāni ceti ṣoḍaśa vikṛtaya eveti pañcaviṃśatistattvāni |

puruṣārthasya hetoḥ svayameva kṣīravat pravartamānāyāḥ prakṛteḥ kimantargaḍunā pramāṇaśūnyapravartakāntaraparigraheṇetyādyarthapratipādakaṃ dṛṣṭānumānāgamapramāṇakaṃ kapilamunipraṇītaṃ śāstraṃ sāṅkhyaṃ nāma |
vikāreṣu ca prakṛtermahān jāyate mahataḥ ṣaḍviśeṣāḥ ahaṃkāraḥ pañca tanmātrāṇi ca |
tatrāhaṃkārasyāviśeṣasya viśeṣā ekādaśendriyāṇi śabdatanmātratāviśeṣasya viśeṣa ākāśaḥ |
evaṃ sparśatanmātrādīnāmaviśeṣāṇāṃ vāyvādayo viśeṣā ityādi pratipādyate |

tayorapi śiṣṭaiḥ pramāṇatvābhyupagamāt |
sāṃkhyo yogaḥ pāñcarātraṃ vedāḥ pāśupataṃ tathā |
etānyapi pramāṇāni na hantavyāni hetubhiḥ ||
iti mahābhāratokteḥ |
trayī sāṃkhyaṃ yogaḥ paśupatimataṃ vaiṣṇavamiti bhaṭṭācāryokteśca |

anyeṣāṃ tu darśanānāṃ keṣāñcit pūrvapakṣatvena bādhyatvāt keṣāñcidvimardāsahatvena heyatvāccetad
agrahaṇamiti veditavyam |
mama tadastīti vacanena kiṃ phalamiti śeṣaḥ |
athavā kaścicchabdo'paricchedyamukhena mukhyavācakaḥ, yaḥ kaścidvikramo ’yaṃ ko ’py eṣa vīraśiśukākṛtiḥ ityādiṣu tathā darśanānmukhya upakāro nāsti, asyopaskārakatvamātram |
upaskāryāyāḥ śaktereva kavitvaṃ prati prādhānyamiti bhāvaḥ |
vyutpattitaḥ śaktereva kavitvaṃ prati prādhānyād avyutpattikṛtasya doṣasya śaktyatiraskriyamāṇatvāt |
bahujñasyāpi loke śaktivandhyasya tricaturapadaguṃbhanārambhe'pi stambhakampādisambhramaśālinaḥ, samaradharaṇīmavatarata iva kātarasya, vacaḥprasarāniṣpatterniṣpattau vā hāsyāyatanatvāt |

kiñcijjñasyāpi tu śaktimataḥ kimapi racayitumunmukhasya siddhāñjanarañjitadṛśa iva mahānidhīnāṃ svarasata evāhamahamikayāhaṃpūrvikayā ca vividhabhaṅgitaraṅgitānāṃ śabdānāṃ prādurbhāvādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kavitvabījarūpasaṃskāraviśeṣātmikā śaktireva pradhānam |

ataḥ śaktikāryamāha—yat prauḍhitvamityādi ||
ukteḥ prauḍhaḥ parīpākaḥ procyate prauḍhisaṃjñayā |
iti śrībhojaḥ |

pākaśca lakṣito vāmanena
yatpadāni tyajantyeva parivṛttisahiṣṇutām |
taṃ śabdanyāsaniṣṇātāḥ śabdapākaṃ pracakṣate ||
iti |

kramotkarṣāt dṛḍhamadhuratvācca |
padārthe vākyavacanaṃ vākyārthe ca padābhidhā |
prauḍhirvyāsasamāsau ca sābhiprāyatvamasya ca ||
iti vāmanenārthadvārāpi prauḍhir uktā |

tadubhayamapyatra svīkriyate |
vikaṭākṣarabandhatvamāryairaudāryamucyate |
iti śrībhojaḥ |
utkarṣavān guṇaḥ kaścidukteryasmin pratīyate |
tadudārāhvayaṃ tena sanāthā kāvyapaddhatiḥ ||
iti daṇḍinaḥ |
lāghave punastārkikagocaraṃ gatasyārthasya caṇḍamārutolluṇṭhitasya tūlapiṇḍasyeva śatadhā khaṇḍanaprasaṅgāt |
yaditi dvābhyāṃ vacasāṃ viśeṣyamāṇatvādekasya yadupādānaṃ gauraveṇa arthasyaiva viśeṣyamāṇatvāt pṛthak yacchabdopādānamiti mantavyam |

pāṇḍityaṃ paṇḍitasya karma bhāvo vā śabdārthajñānaṃ bāhuśrutyaṃ ca |
paṇḍā tu saṃskṛtā buddhistadvān paṇḍita ucyate |
vaidagdhyaṃ vidagdhasya karma bhāvo vā |

vyaṅgyārthasaṃvit vyañjakaśabdaprayogasāmarthyaṃ ca |
agrāmye saralodāravidagdhacchekadakṣiṇā |
iti vaijayantī |
paṇḍito vāpyanātmavān iti mahābhārate ca paṇḍitātmavatorbhedapratipādanāt |
anena parīkṣakān prati yatnataḥ parīkṣaṇaprārthanā sūcyate |
asti dakṣiṇāpatha ityādinā pāṇḍityavaidagdhyayor ity antena prakaraṇena bharatavihitetikartavyatārūpasambandhābhidheyaprayojanajñāpanārthaṃ kavinā svagotranāmanī pratipādite |
yān udāharanty āryamiśrāḥ ityādinā pariṣadaḥ pūjā |
prakaraṇanāyakasya mālatīvallabhasya mādhavasya iti vakṣyamāṇena mālatīmādhavau nāyakau, tāvadhikṛtya kṛto grantho mālatīmādhavamiti prakaraṇanāma ca sūcitaṃ veditavyam |
lubākhyāyikābhyaḥ pratyayasya bahulam vā. 4-3-87 iti lup |

yathoktaṃ bharatena—
gotraṃ nāma ca gṛhṇīyāt pūjāvākyaṃ ca pārṣadaḥ |
nāṭakasya ca yannāma garbhanirdiṣṭalakṣaṇam ||
iti |

atha
divyamartye sa tadrūpo miśramanyatarastayoḥ |
sūcayedvastubījaṃ vā mukhaṃ pātramathāpi vā ||
iti vacanāt || 10 ||
bhaṅgyā pātrasūcanamukhena kāvyārthaṃ sthāpayati— naṭaḥ—tā iti |
śṛṇuta manobhiravahitaiḥ kriyāmimāṃ kālidāsasya ity atra śṛṇuteti, na tu paśyatetyukteḥ |

gatibuddhipratyavasānārthaśabdakarmākarma
kāṇāmaṇi kartā sa ṇau 1-4-52 iti śabdakarmakatvād dvikarmakatā |
saugatajaratpravrājikāyāḥ bauddhasiddhāntavartinyā vṛddhāyāḥ sannyāsinyāḥ kāmandakīti saṃjñā |
anuvādyasya vidheyamukhaprekṣitvamāśaṅkya sūtradhāraḥ pṛcchati—tataḥ kim iti |
suvihitaṃ kartavyatvena suṣṭhu śikṣitam ity arthaḥ |
vidheyasya kāmandakītvasyoddeśye viśrāntyā saṃvṛtta ityetado viśeṣaṇāt pulliṅgatā |
ete ca madhyamādhame viṣkambhapātre iti mantavyam |

ādau viṣkambhakaṃ kuryādaṅkaṃ vā kāryayuktitaḥ |
apekṣitaṃ parityajya nīrasaṃ vastuvistaram ||
yadā sandarśayeccheṣaṃ kuryādviṣkambhakaṃ tadā |
ity ukteḥ |

vṛttavartiṣyamāṇānāṃ kathāṃśānāṃ nidarśakaḥ |
saṃkṣepārthastu viṣkambho madhyapātraprayojitaḥ ||
ekānekakṛtaḥ śuddhaḥ saṅkīrṇo nīcamadhyamaiḥ |
ity ukteḥ saṅkīrṇaścāyam |

pāṭhyantu saṃskṛtaṃ naṝṇāmanīcānāṃ kṛtātmanām |
liṅginīnāṃ mahādevyā mantrijāveśyayoḥ kvacit ||
ity ukter liṅginītvāt pūrvasyāḥ saṃskṛtavyavahāraḥ |

gāndhikamālikarajakastrī pravrājikātha viketrī |
dhātrī prativeśanikā sthirabhāvā dūtya etāḥ syuḥ ||
iti kāmasūtrokteḥ |

rathī sūtena cāyuṣmān pūjyaiḥ śiṣyātmajānujāḥ |
vatsa tāteti pūjyo ’pi sugṛhītābhidhaśca taiḥ ||
ityukteḥ |

tathāhi—caritabrahmacaryasyāsya sarvopakārakṣamaṃ dvitīyamāśramamavalambituṃ prāptakālasya sahadharmacāriṇīlābho yajñapañcakasādhanatvāt sukhahetutvādrājāmātyarūpabandhulābhānubandhitvācca trivargamūlam |

yadā bhartā ca bhāryā ca parasparavaśānugau |
tadā dhamārthakāmānāṃ trayāṇāmapi saṅgatiḥ ||
iti mahābhāratokteḥ |
stokoddiṣṭas tu taddhetubījaṃ vistāryanekadhā iti vacanāt |
kalyāṇinoḥ kalyāṇaṃ puṇyakarma, tadvatī kalyāṇinī, tadvān kalyāṇī |
anena daivasampannatvādavyabhicaritasiddhitvaṃ tayoḥ, atisnehaḥ punarasmān vyākulayatīti dyotyate |
yathāsaṅkhyena bhūrivasorapatyaṃ mālatī devarātasyāpatyaṃ mādhavaḥ, tayoḥ |
vivṛṇvatā idaṃ tvatsamīpa eva vartamānamabhīṣṭārtharūpaṃ maṅgalaṃ dṛśyatāmiti darśayateva, na punaḥ kathayateti |

dākṣiṇyaṃ nāma tatprāhuranukūlapravṛttiṣu |
prāṇān apy ādadānasya sthātuṃ śaktir na yad bhavet ||
iti lakṣitam |
atra sphuraṇasya vivaraṇatvenotprekṣaṇam antarajñatvaṃ hetuḥ, ataḥ pūrvārdhe utprekṣālaṅkāraḥ |

lakṣyālakṣya ivodbhedas tasya pratimukhaṃ bhavet |
tasya vilāsādīni trayodaśāṅgāni |

garbhastu dṛṣṭanaṣṭasya bījasyānveṣaṇaṃ muhuḥ |
tasya cābhūtāharaṇādīni dvādaśāṅgāni |

krodhenāvamṛśedyatra vyasanādvā vilobhanāt |
garbhanirbhinnabījārthaṃ so'vamarśa iti smṛtaḥ ||
tasya cāpavādādyāni trayodaśāṅgāni |

bījavanto mukhādyarthā viprakīrṇā yathāyatham |
aikārthyam upanīyante yatra nirvahaṇaṃ hi tat ||
tasya ca sandhyādīni caturdaśāṅgāni |
eṣāṃ ca ṣaṭprayojanāṅgāni vivakṣitārthanibandhanaṃ, gopyagopanaṃ, prakāśyaprakāśanam, abhinavarāgavṛddhiḥ, camatkārakāritvaṃ, kāryasyetivṛttavistara iti |
mahanto mahān khalv eṣa bhagavatyāś cittāvakṣepaḥ |
tasmiṃś cottruṭitasaṃsārāvagraho yuṣmābhir apy ātmā nikṣipyate |

pṛthivyāṃ sāgarāntāyāṃ dvāveva puruṣādhamau |
gṛhasthaśca nirārambhaḥ sārambhaścaiva bhikṣukaḥ ||
iti ninditatvāt |
avidyākāmakarmaparatantrā sukhaduḥkhādikaluṣā laukikapravṛttiḥ saṃsāraḥ, sa evāvagraho bandhanam |
mā maivam—evaṃ mā vādīr ity arthaḥ |
sa bhavān pūjyaḥ saḥ, tatra bhavānitivat |

vastusiddhaṃ prati prāhurudbhūtāṃ kāraṇaiḥ svakaiḥ |
sukhāvahāṃ ca tadbuddhau snehākhyāmātmavikriyām ||
iti divākaraḥ |
tasya phalaṃ prayojanaṃ hṛdayagatasya snehasya kāryānumeyatvāt |

praṇayaḥ syāt paricaye yācñāyāṃ sauhṛde ’pi ca |
iti vaijayantī |
upavāsādibhiḥ prāṇānapi parikleśya teṣāmārjitatvāt prāṇebhyo ’pi tapasāṃ svalobhaviṣayatvaṃ prakāśyate |
upāyāntaraviraheṇaitaiḥ suhṛdaḥ kāryaṃ nirvartayituṃ śakyaṃ cet tat kṛtaṃ syāt |
na punaḥ kriyamāṇaṃ kariṣyamāṇaṃ vā tannirvartitam eva bhaved ity avadhāraya |
mā te ’tra saṃśayo bhūd ity arthaḥ |
uttarārdhe prāṇebhyastapobhyaś ca suhṛtkāryasya gauravakathanād vyatirekālaṅkāradhvaniḥ |
kiṃ na vetsi, idam iti śeṣaḥ |
sāhacaryam iti satīrthyatayā dharmato bhrātṛtvamabhaṅgurasnehayantritatvaṃ ca |
anuvādena nirvahaṇāṅgasya saudāminīpātrasya bhaṅgyā sūcanaṃ kriyate |
strīpuṃsasādhāraṇenāpatyaśabdena daivavaśāt putravataḥ putrāya duhitṛmān duhitaraṃ dadātviti dyotyate |
iyaṃ pratijñā kāryasya mukhyaṃ bījam, kāryasya tatkāryatvāt pāṇigrahasya |
yanmāṃ vidheya ityārabhya āvābhyāmapatyasambandhaḥ kartavyaḥ ity antaḥ parikaraḥ |

ānvīkṣikyātmavidyā syādvīkṣaṇāt sukhaduḥkhayoḥ |
īkṣamāṇastayā tattvaṃ harṣaśokau vyudasyati ||
iti kāmandakaḥ |
kuṇḍinaṃ vidarbharājanagarī kuṇḍinaṃ na pravekṣyāmi ityādivacanāt |
padmāvatīti bhūrivasornivāsaḥ purī, tāṃ pratītyāpatati, preṣayatetyukteḥ |

tau dampatī svāṃ prati rājadhānīṃṣṭasampreṣayāmāsa vaśī vasiṣṭhaḥ |
itivat |
tataḥ kimiti mālatīmamātyo mādhavāyātmanā na pratipādayati, yena caurikāvivāhe bhagavatīṃ tvarayati |
tataḥ yasmāt svayaṃ pratijñākṛtā abhijanādayaśca parasya vijñātāḥ tasmāt |

apyājñayā śāsiturātmanā vāṣṭaprāpto ’si sambhāvayituṃ vanānmām |
itivat |
sākṣāt pratiṣedhaḥ na dāsyāmīti mukhataḥ pratyākhyānam |

s.quote: āścaryaṃ na khalvamātyo mādhavasya nāmāpi jānātīti nirapekṣatayā lakṣyate |

p.s: abhijanādi sarvaṃ jānannapi nāmāpi na jānātīti virodhaḥ |

saṃrakṣenmantrabījaṃ tu tadbījaṃ hi mahīkṣitām |
tasmin bhinne dhruvo bhedo gupte guptiranuttamā ||
iti kāmandakokteḥ |
na kevalaṃ lokato mantrasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ kāryamapi tvato hetorityāha—viśeṣatastviti |
na kevalaṃ doṣaḥ pratyutāsmākaṃ guṇa evetyarthaḥ |
tatra vidita ityarthe lokasarvalokābhyāṃ ṭhañ 5-1-44, anuśatikādīnāṃ ca 7-3-20 ityubhayapadavṛddhiḥ |
punar amātyamatim ullaṅghya yauvanamadamohitau tau svātantryeṇa parasparānurāgataḥ pravṛttāviti kiṃvadantyāṃ bhavantyām ity arthaḥ |
nītiśāstraniścitamateḥ puruṣasyaivaṃprāyeṣu prayogeṣu phalāvyabhicarimatigāmbhīryādanitarajñeyacaritatvaṃ ca loke nipuṇairnirūpaṇīyamityāha—paśyeti |
sarvākārapravaṇaramaṇīyaṃ veṣabhāṣādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ prakārairanuddhatam, akṛtrimatvapratīteḥ śobhanaṃ ca yathā syāt tathā |

vi nānārthe ’va sandehe hāro haraṇam ucyate |
nānāsandehaharaṇādvyavahāra iti smṛtaḥ ||
iti smṛteḥ |
parābhyūhasthānāni pareṣāṃ śatrūṇāmayamanyathā vṛtta iti vitarkajanakāni randhrāṇi |

vañcanaṃ tvatisandhānaṃ vyalīkaṃ ca pratāraṇam |
iti vaijayantī |
taṭasthaḥ tīrasthita eva na punarjalamavatīrṇa iti lākṣaṇikaḥ prayogaḥ |
yathā tīragata eva bako matsyamanveti tameva kabalīkṛtya tūṣṇīmāste, tathā svayaṃ dūrasthito'nanupraviṣṭa evetyarthaḥ |
sādhyamāne kārye tūṣṇīṃ bhavatu nāma, siddhe punar vikatthanam api śobhate ity āśaṅkyāha—maunaṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvam |
phalasiddhāvapi kaimarthakyādeva vikatthanaṃ na karotīty arthaḥ |

siṃhavacceṣṭamānasyu kāle karma vipaścitaḥ |
kriyamāṇaṃ svakulyāstu vidyurasyāpare kṛtam ||
iti kāmandakokteḥ |
mayāpi yuṣmadvacanāttena tenopanyāsena bhūrivasumandirāsannarājamārgeṇa mādhavaḥ sañcāryate |
dhātreyikāgrahaṇaṃ ca tasyā api dūtīvarge gaṇitatvāt |
bhavanavalabhī svagṛhakūṭāgāram, samaṃ vadhūbhirvalabhīryuvānaḥ iti māghokteḥ |
anena tasyā mādhavenādarśanaṃ kathyate, abhiyogamātrasādhyatvaṃ ca |
ratir ivetyanena bhāvinīm avyabhicaritāṃ premaphalapravṛttiṃ dyotayati |
gāḍhotkaṇṭhā antaḥ prarūḍhaḥ utkaṇṭhākhyo bhāvo yasyāḥ |

sarvendriyasukhāsvādo yatrāstīti manaskriyā |
tatprāptīcchāṃ sasaṅkalpāmutkaṇṭhāṃ kavayo viduḥ ||
iti bhāvaprakāśaḥ |
mae vi ityārabhya tāmyati ityantaṃ karaṇam, prakṛtārambhāt || 18 ||
ākāśayānena ākāśagamanābhinayena, bhīṣaṇojjvalaveṣā [bhīṣaṇaḥ] bhayaṅkaraḥ śūlakapālādiviśiṣṭatayā, ujjvalaḥ dīptaḥ kapilajaṭājūṭakanakakiṅkiṇyādisaṅkalanād, veṣa ākalpakalpanā yasyāḥ |
kapālakuṇḍaleti prathamāṅke taṃ kkhu siripavvadādo āadassa ityādi aṇusaṃjhaṃ samāacchadi ityantena sūcitā prakarīpātraṃ aghoraghaṇṭaśiṣyā kāpālikī ityarthaḥ |
[ṣaḍadhikadaśanāḍīcakramadhyasthitātmā] ṣaṭsaṅkhyottaradaśasaṅkhyāviśiṣṭānāṃ nāḍīcakrāṇāṃ madhye sthitaḥ karṇikāsu sadā sannihitaḥ ātmā sphurattārūpaṃ tattvaṃ yasya |
atra nāḍīśabdena dehamadhyavartinī suṣumnākhyā brahmanāḍī vivakṣyate |

tadyathā—mahābindupīṭhasthānamatītasthānamāgatasthānaṃ śāntātītaṃ sūryacakraṃ
vyomāmbhojaṃ pretabhūmirardhacandramārambhaṃ setubandhamājñā viśuddhiranāhataṃ maṇipūrakaṃ svādhiṣṭhānaṃ mūlādhāra iti |

teṣvādyaṃ vyomarūpāvasthātmakaniṣkalākāśaḥ, dvitīyaṃ vyāpinyavasthā, tṛtīyamunmanāvasthā, caturthaṃ samāvasthā, pañcamaṃ visargākhyaparāśaktisthānaṃ, ṣaṣṭhaṃ visargāvasthitaśāntākhyaṃ brahmarandhraṃ, saptamaṃ brahmarandhrāvasthitakarṇikāsthānagataśaktyākhyasadāśivasthānaṃ, aṣṭamaṃ sahasrārapadmasya ṣoḍaśakalātmakakesarasthānaṃ, navamaṃ nādātmakasahasradalasthānaṃ, daśamaṃ bindvātmakalalāṭamadhyavyoma, ekādaśaṃ bhruvormadhyaṃ, dvādaśamīśvarasthānaṃ kaṇṭhasthānaṃ, trayodaśaṃ rudrālayaṃ hṛdayasthānaṃ, caturdaśaṃ viṣṇusthānaṃ nābhirandhraṃ, pañcadaśaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ liṅgamūlaṃ, ṣoḍaśaṃ kuṇḍalinī dehamadhyamiti vibhāgaḥ |

athavā—
iḍā piṅgalā suṣumnā ca gāndhārī hastijihnikā |
suyaśālambusā pūṣā kuhūścaiva ca śaṅkhinī ||
vimalā ghoṣiṇī pṛthvī tataścāpyāyanī matā |
tejovatī vāyavī ca nāḍyaḥ ṣoḍaśa kīrtitāḥ ||
iti yogaśāstroktānāṃ nāḍīnāṃ samūhasya madhyacakre hṛdayakamala ity arthaḥ |
hṛdi vinihitarūpaḥ hṛdaye viśeṣeṇa nihitaṃ, na tu nidhīyamānamityanena sākṣātkṛtatvaṃ dhvanyate, viniṣpannasamādhitvaṃ cocyate |
yadvā pātālagulikāñjanakhaḍgamudrākhyā adhikāramantrayogātmajñānākhyā vā pañcasiddhiṃ dadātīti |
tadvidāṃ tat ṣaḍadhikadaśanāḍīcakramadhyasthitātmatvaṃ gurumukhena jñātavatāṃ labdhavatāṃ vā, viderjñānārthāllābhārthādvā kvibantavyutpattyā |

avicālitamanobhiḥ
ālasyaṃ vyādhayastīvrāḥ pramādo'sthānasaṃśayaḥ |
anavasthitacittatvamaśraddhā bhrāntidarśanam ||
duḥkhāni daurmanasyaṃ ca viṣayeṣu ca lolatā |
daśaite yuñjatāṃ puṃsāmantarāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ||
iti,
upasargāḥ pravartante divyāḥ ṣaṭ siddhisūcakāḥ |
pratibhā śravaṇaṃ vārttā darśanāsvādavedanāḥ ||
iti ca yogaśāstroktair antarāyair upasargaiś cāvighnitaikāgryaṃ mano yeṣām |
sādhakaiḥ mantrayogasādhanapravṛttaiḥ, na tu siddhairiti yuktaṃ prakāśyate |
śaktibhiḥ pariṇaddhaḥ sargasthitisaṃhārādiviśeṣairmūlaśaktivyāpārabhedairyatra yatra militā marīcayaḥ tatra tatra vibhureva jṛmbhata iti abhiyuktoktaistaraṇiriva kiraṇajālairjagadvyāptaḥ |

tattvaṃ vastuta ekaṃ śivasaṃjñaṃ citraśaktiśatakhacitam |
śaktivyāpṛtibhedāttasyaite kalpitā bhedāḥ ||
iti bhojokteḥ |

athavā—
vāmā jyeṣṭhā śivā raudrī cittonmādakarī sukhā |
kāḷī kalebarā bhūtadamanī ceśaśaktayaḥ ||
iti śrutyāgamasiddhābhir navabhiḥ śaktibhiḥ samantād baddhaḥ sevitaḥ |

śaktināthaḥ
cidacidanugrahahetostasya sisṛkṣorya ādya unmeṣaḥ |
tacchaktitattvamabhihitamavibhāgāpannamasyaiva ||
iti lakṣitāyāḥ svāvyatiriktāyāḥ sarvakartryāḥ pṛthivyādisadāśivāntānāṃ catustriṃśattattvānāmudayavilayasthānabhūtāyāḥ pañcastriṃśyāḥ śakteḥ svāmī ṣaḍtriṃśakaḥ śiva iti |

akuḷaṃ śiva ityuktaṃ kuḷaṃ śaktiḥ prakīrtitam |
kauḷaṃ tejovikāraḥ syāditi tritayanirṇayaḥ ||
iti śrīrudratantrokteḥ, śivaḥ śaktistatkāryajātaṃ ceti samastatattvānāṃ śivāgame tridhā saṅgṛhītatvāt sa tādṛśaḥ |
jayati sarvotkarṣeṇa vartata iti tadvimarśasukhasya samagrānyasukhātiśayitatvamanusandhatte |
atra nāḍīcakrādīnāṃ śāstramātraprayuktānāṃ prayogādapratītatve ’pi tadvidaḥ svayaṃparāmarśatvādadoṣaḥ |

tāṭasthyena parameśvarasya mahimānaṃ parāmṛśyedānīmātmanastadviṣayamanubhavaṃ tatphalamaṇimādisiddhiṃ ca prakāśayati—iyamidānīmahaṃ yā khalvevambhūtamīśvaraṃ guruprasādājjānāmi iyamīdṛśī aham ity arthaḥ |
nityanyaste sadā tattat sthāneṣu sthāpite, nityagrahaṇāttadaikāgryaṃ prakāśyate, ṣaḍaṅgacakre hṛdayādyaṅgaṣaṭkacakre, nihitaṃ tannyāsasya sānnidhyahetutvāt |

sarvajñatā tṛptiranādibodhaḥṣṭasvatantratā nityamaluptaśaktiḥ |
anantaśaktiśca vibhorvidhijñāṣṭaṣaḍāhuraṅgāni maheśvarasya ||
ityuktānāṃ svajātiyuktānāṃ ṣaṇṇāmaṅgānāṃ hṛdayaśiraḥśikhākavacanetrāstrasthānanyastānāṃ samudāye sphuritamityarthaḥ |

athavā ṣaṭsu aṅgacakreṣu śārīreṣvādhārapadmeṣu mūlādhārasvādhiṣṭhānamaṇipūrakānāhataviśuddhyājñāsaṃjñeṣu nityanyasteṣu kramāccatuṣṣaḍdaśadvādaśaṣoḍaśadvidaleṣu vādisāntairbādilāntairḍādiphāntaiḥ kādiṭhāntairādivisargāntairhakṣābhyāṃ ca nityaṃ kṛtanyāseṣu sannihitamityarthaḥ |
pa(ñcā ? dmā)nāmupadeśagamyatvāddhṛdayakamalasphuraṇasya tu sarvalokānubhavagocaratayā hṛtpadmamadhye uditaṃ viśeṣataḥ prakāśamānamityarthaḥ |
nahi kaścit mama śirasi haste pāde vā jñānamiti manyate, sarvo ’pi mama hṛdyevaṃ pratibhātīti hṛdayadarpaṇapratibimbitatvena caitanyaṃ pratipādyate |
layavaśācchivarūpiṇaṃ suṣumnārandhrodgatayā nīvāraśūkavat tanīyasyā svabhāsā dvādaśāntasthaparamaśivenaikyabhāvanayā līnadrutatvāt kaṭakamiva kanakapiṇḍena, tadrūpaṃ śivarūpiṇaṃ śivatvamāpannam |
paśyantī na tu cintayantīti sākṣātkāraṃ dyotayati |

yathāha gurudevaḥ—
sākāraṃ dhyānamuddiṣṭaṃ nirākāramathocyate |
hṛtpadme vā bhruvormadhye bindau vā dvādaśāntake ||
laiṅgikaṃ paramaṃ jyotirdhyāyedaṅguṣṭhāmātrakam |
tasmānnīvāraśūkābhaṃ jyotirūrdhvaṃ suṣumnayā ||
nirgataṃ dvādaśāntasthaśivenāpyekatāṃ gatam |
viśvamāvṛtya tad vyāptaṃ dhyāyenniścalamānasaḥ ||
dhyānānāmuttamastvetadyogaścāyaṃ paro mataḥ |
evaṃ satatayuktātmā yogī nirdhūtabandhanaḥ ||
aṇimādiguṇaiśvaryaṃ prāpya nirvāṇamṛcchati ||
iti |
līye parabrahmaṇi, līnaṃ pare brahmaṇi yasya cetaḥ iti, “sthitametat |

yasya yato notpattistasya
tasmin vṛttiḥ pralayo, na svarūpalayaḥ” ityādyācāryaprayogāt |

puṭayorubhayośca daṇḍasaṃsthāṣṭapṛthivī toyamadhaḥ kṛśānurūrdhvam |
pavanastiryaṅ naso'tha madhyeṣṭagaganaṃ bhūtagatistanūdbhaveyam ||
ityācāryopadiṣṭenābhivyaktiprakāreṇa tattadbhūtodayaḥ, tattatsvīkaraṇasya saukaryamityarthaḥ |
pañcāmṛtākarṣaṇāt pañcavidhasya amṛtasya svīkaraṇāt, śabdasparśarasarūpagandhānāṃ sāro yaḥ sañjīvanatvādamṛtākhyastasyāmṛtākarṣaṇyākhyayā vidyayā samākṛṣyāsādanenāpyāyitatvāt |

athavā kaulikatantraparibhāṣitasya—
viṭ ca mūtramasṛṅ majjā śuklaṃ pañcāmṛtaṃ smṛtam |
ityamṛtapañcakasya, tasyāpi śarīrāvasthātmakatvādamṛtatvoktiḥ |

sarve yogavibhāgena samāsāḥ syuralakṣitāḥ |”
iti aluk |
idānīmahamabhyāgatā siripavvadādo aṇusaṃjhaṃ āacchaï iti pūrvaprastāvādidānīmeva śrīparvatān nirgatā |

udvṛttā utpatanavegena sthānāduccalitā, skhalitā punarnivṛttā ca yā kapālakaṇṭhamālā śiraḥkarparamayī kaṇṭhabhūṣaṇārthā mālā, tasyāḥ saṅghaṭṭanenāsphālanena kvaṇitāḥ śabditāḥ karālāḥ vikṛtāḥ, nānāprakāratvāt, kiṅkiṇyaḥ kṣudraghaṇṭikāstāḥ api arthāt kaṇṭhamālātvena sthitā yatra |
gaganatalaprayāṇavegaḥ gaganatale yat prayāṇaṃ tasya vegaḥ rayaḥ || 3 ||
nibiḍagranthibandhaḥ dṛḍhagrathano bandhaḥ bandhasādhanaṃ paṭṭāṃśukādi yasya |

nibiḍaṃ nibirīsañca dṛḍhaṃ sāndraṃ nirantaram |
iti vaijayantī |
saṃskārakvāṇadīrghaṃ vīcītaraṅganyāyena prathamaśabdotpāditaiḥ śabdasantānairanuraṇanāparaparyāyaiś cirakālāvasthāyi yathā tathetyarthaḥ |
paṭu svata eva spaṣṭaṃ yathā tathā |
kṛtāvṛtti punaḥpunar jihvāghaṭṭanena kṛtā āvṛttiḥ paunaḥpunyaṃ yathā tatheti trayaṃ raṭanakriyāviśeṣaṇam |

khaṭvāṅgaghaṇṭā khaṭvāṅgaṃ nāma khaṭvāpādasadṛśa āyudhaviśeṣaḥ,
mahokṣaḥ khaṭvāṅgaṃ paraśurajinaṃ bhasma phaṇinaḥ |
ityādyācāryavacanāt, tasya śirasi baddhā ghaṇṭā |
vivṛtaśavaśiraḥśreṇikuñjeṣu vyāttamukhānāṃ kapālānāṃ śreṇirmālā, tasyā randhreṣu praveśād guñjan śabdāyamānaḥ |

khaṭvāṅge svaprānte ca yathā samaṃ vartate tathā calayatītyarthaḥ,
yaṣṭyagre ca samaṃ sthito dhvajapaṭaḥ prānte ca vegānilāt |
ityuktavat |

ariṣṭaḥ sarvatobhadrahiṅguniryāsamālakāḥ |
picumandaś ca nimbaḥ
ityamaraḥ |
abhyaktasya siktasya, paribharjyamānasya paritaḥ pacyamānasya rasonasya laśunasya raso dravaḥ, tasya gandho yeṣām |

ato nimbatailasya tiktagandhatayā, tatsadṛśagandhasya rasonasya tadavasekena bharjyamānasya tiktakaṭugandhavirasatvāttattulyagandhatvaṃ citādhūmānāmapi dahyamānaśavaśatalomakeśādigandhagarbhatayetyavagantavyam |
citā cityā citiḥ striyāṃ iti vaijayantī |

tatsambandhibhir dhūmaiḥ viyati prasaradbhirliṅgatvenādhastādvartitayā vibhāvitasya prakāśitasya, mahataḥ mahānagarasambandhādvistīrṇasyetyanena janabāhulyājjāyamānānāmiva mriyamāṇānāmapyasaṃkhyatvācchavabāhulyaṃ prakāśyate |
śmaśānavāṭasya pitṛvanapradeśasya, nedīyaḥ antikatamam, karālāyatanaṃ karālāsaṃjñitāyāścāmuṇḍāyā ālayaḥ |
atthi ettha ṇaarīe ityādi pūrvaprastutaṃ saṃghaṭayati |
sādhanaṃ kalpoktaṃ puraścaraṇaṃ yasya samavasitetyanenāmaṅgalaṃ ca bhāvi sūcyate |
etāvatyeva tasya mantrasādhanaṃ sampūrṇamataḥ paraṃ pareṣyatvāditi sūcanāt |
adya saviśeṣamiti puraścaraṇārambhadivasādārabhya taddinaparyantaṃ sāmānyapūjāyā nivṛttatvāt “aṇusaṃjhaṃ āacchaï” ityanenārthasya prāgeva sūcitatvāt |
pūjāsambhāraḥ arcanārthasya madhumāṃsāderdravyasya sāmagrī, sannidhāpanīyaḥ sannihitaḥ kartavyaḥ |
saviśeṣam iti sūcitaṃ viśeṣaṃ bhaṅgyā prakāśayati—kathitaṃ hīti uktaṃ yasmāt |
me guruṇeti tasya svasyāṃ visrambhaḥ, svasyāśca taduktyā santoṣaḥ prakāśyate |

strīratnam iti upayācanaprakāraṃ sūcayati, ubhayakulaśuddhatvādrūpalakṣaṇādisampannatvācca strījāteḥ śreṣṭhāṃ kanyāṃ mantrasādhanā
vasāne pūrṇāhutitvenopahariṣyāmīti pratiśrutamityarthaḥ |
viditaṃ asmin gṛhe vartate iti pūrvam evānviṣya jñātamityarthaḥ |
ataḥ saviśeṣam iti tadākarṣaṇam api kartavyam ity arthaḥ |
na khalu mahāmāṃsavikrayādanyamupāyāntaram ity upakṣiptāya mahāmāṃsavikrayāya makarandaṃ vañcayitvā ātmanaiva śmaśānaṃ praviśato nāyakasya praveśanaṃ sūcayati—tad iti |
yan mamāpi kautukaṃ janayati tasmān nirūpaṇīya evāyam ity arthaḥ |
atigambhīramadhurākṛtiḥ atyantamaparicchedyā manoharānulbaṇā vā ākṛtiḥ śarīrasaṃsthānaṃ yasya |

yasya prakārādākāre krodhaharṣabhayādayaḥ |
santo ’pi nopalakṣyante gāmbhīryaṃ tat pracakṣate ||
iti divākaraḥ |
anena nirbhayatvena vetālādibhir api pakṣe samarāya sannaddhatvaṃ dyotyate |
praharaṇārthebhyaḥ pare niṣṭhāsaptamyau vā. 2-2-37 bhavata iti vaktavyam iti samāsaḥ |
anena priyāvirahamahāpatpratīkāradhiyā mahāmāṃsavikrayodyuktasya śastradhāraṇaṃ droṇādīnāmiva na doṣa iti sūcayati kaviḥ |

ajīvaṃstu yathoktena brāhmaṇaḥ svena karmaṇā |
jīvet kṣatriyadharmeṇa sa hyasya pratyagantaraḥ ||
iti manuvacanāt |
lalitavikaṭanyāsaḥ prakṛtyā sagarvatvād ramaṇīyaḥ tvarayā vikaṭaḥ pūrvasmād virūpaḥ, vikaṭaṃ tu virūpaṃ syād iti vaijayantī, nyāso arthāt padayoḥ nikṣepo yasya |
śrīmān ekāky api bahujanaparivṛta iva tejoviśeṣānumitalakṣmīka ity arthaḥ |
mṛgāṅketyanena viṣādamalinimāpi kiñcid vidyata iti dyotyate |

anyathā—
udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣaṇam |
niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavatyāyuḥparikṣaye ||
iti rāmāyaṇokteḥ |
haratītyanena tasya vastuto vidyamānatvamāha, avidyamānasya haraṇānupapatteḥ |
pravigaladasṛkpaṅkaḥ tatkṣaṇacchedāt māṃsasya prakarṣeṇa kṣaradrudhirakardamo yasmin |

payasā mudgayūṣeṇa jāṅgalānāṃ rasena vā |
iti vāhaṭokteḥ |
atra naragrahaṇenoparyapi nṛmāṃsapaṇanāyeti nṛgrahaṇāt svamāṃsavikrayabuddhirna kāryā, mahāmāṃsavikraya iti prakārabhedena puruṣopahārasyaiva kathanāt puruṣāṅgopakalpitamiti vakṣyamāṇatvācca |
anyathā lalannijajāṅgalaḥ iti bhrāmyan svamāṃsapaṇanāyeti ca vaktavyam |
jāṅgalagrahaṇena kṛpāṇakhaṇḍitāt puruṣadehādupahārayogyatvena kalpakathitaṃ māṃsaṃ vapādivad gṛhītamiti darśayati |
asyāś ca tatsambandhaparijñānakathanaṃ vakṣyamāṇasya saudāminīmukhena mālatīrakṣaṇasya ghaṭanārtham |
vyavahṛpaṇoḥ samarthayoḥ 2-3-57 iti vikrayārthasya paṇeḥ prayoge karmaṇī ṣaṣṭhī |
tat kimanena tasmāt pūrvadṛṣṭatvāt kimidānīmasminnapūrvavat kautukaṃ kriyata ityarthaḥ |
athavā dīrghajaṭāvallarī iti, gajabhagne patanāya vallarī ityādiprayogaiḥ pratatāyatatvāttamolatābhirityarthaḥ |
adhastāttu prāntavṛtyā prāntānāṃ jaladhivelāpradeśānāṃ vṛtirvaraṇaṃ chādanaṃ tayā tamonimittayā hetubhūtayā |
sandhyānubandhatāmre pariṇatatālaphalatviṣi medinī nimīlayati navapayasi tamasi iti harṣacaritokteḥ |
madhye punaḥ vātyāyāḥ saṃvegena mahatā javena viṣvagvitatāyāḥ sarvato vistāritāyā valayitāyāstenaiva vartulīkṛtāyāḥ sphītāyāḥ sāndrāyāḥ dhūmyāyāḥ dhūmasaṃhateḥ prakāśaḥ śobheva śobhā yasya |
vātyā vātastu maṇḍalī, dhūmyā vātyā vanyā iti, tattadvṛnde sarvam iti ca vaijayantī |
vaneṣu iti patrapallavādibahalatayā divāpyapraviṣṭasūryakiraṇatvāt tadānīṃ palvalottīrṇavarāhayūthatvādibhiśca viśeṣataḥ śyāmāyamānatvaṃ prakāśyate |
atra tamovallarībhirhetunotprekṣyate-vyomnaḥ paryantāstāpiñchagucchāvalībhiḥ prālambabhūtābhirvriyanta iveti, prāntavṛtyā vasumatī nūtane payasi majjatīveti ca |
tata eva hetostriyāmā vaneṣu nijaṃ nīlimānaṃ prārambhe ’pi taruṇayatīti |
śaiśave sampūrṇasvarūpābhivyaktyabhāvādyauvana eva tadupapatteḥ śaiśave ’pi yuvānaṃ karotīveti dyotakaśūnyotprekṣā |
vākyatraye krameṇa prālambāvalambanairivāmbaravimānasya saviśeṣaramaṇīyatvam, upāntyāntyakrameṇa sarvasyā bhūmeravyaktībhavanam, sthūlāntarebhyo ’pi vanāntarasya nibiḍanīlimatvaṃ ca prakāśyate |

uparyadho'ntarāle ca jagataḥ timirakabalitatvādasmadabhimatasādhanasamucitasamayasampattyā tadarthaṃ niryantraṇamidānīṃ pravartāmahe ityasyārthasya kāraṇamukhena prakāśanād vṛttasya mādhavaśmaśānāvataraṇasya vartiṣyamāṇasya mālatyupahārasya ca darśitatvād viṣkambhaṃ samāpayati—niṣkrānteti |
atha sūcitasya nāyakasya praveśamukhena sarasavastuprayogāyāṅkamārabhate—tataḥ praviśatīti |

dakṣiṇapāṇikalitakṛpāṇakaḥ savyakarakamalalalannarapalalo latāvalayanibiḍanibaddhakuṭilakuntalakakṣyābaddhasudṛḍhacaṇḍātakastribhuvanalobhanīyena raudramadhureṇākāreṇa lalitavikaṭaṃ parikrāmann ity arthaḥ |

na khalu mahāmāṃsavikrayādanyadupāyāntaraṃ iti pūrvāṅkāvasānopakṣiptātmanirapekṣapravṛttiprotsāhakasyābhilāṣavipralambhātmanaḥ śṛṅgārasyāṅginaḥ kavisahṛdayakulaśikhāmaṇiranusandhānaṃ karoti—sāśaṃsam iti |
āśaṃsā prārthanā tayā sahitaṃ ity abhilāṣasvarūpaṃ dyotayati |

saṅkalpecchāsamudbhūtavyavasāyapurassaraḥ |
yastatsamāgamopāyaḥ so'bhilāṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ||
iti lakṣitatvāt |

parasparāśrayatvena nirūḍhaṃ bhāvabandhanam |
yadekāpāyato na syāt tat premeti nigadyate ||
manaso yad dravārdratvaṃ viṣayeṣu mamatvataḥ |
bhayaśaṅkāvasānātmā sa eva sneha ucyate ||
iti ca,
ārdratā śiśiratvaṃ yat sarvāvasthāsu mānasam |
iti ca bhāvaprakāśaḥ |

snehastu pracayādvastuprayukto vivaśaṃ naram |
satataṃ tatsamīpe tu kṣipan prematayoditaḥ ||
iti,
yadyadasya priyaṃ veti tasya tasyāśukāritām |
yogyatāmārdratāṃ prāhṛrmanaḥkāluṣyanāśinīm ||
iti divākaraḥ |

rathāṅganāmnor iva bhāvabandhanaṃ babhūva yat prema parasparāśrayam |
iti raghuvaṃśoktavat |

iśabdavācyo madano māti yatra prakarṣataḥ |
tat prema tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ rate yūnoḥ parasparam ||
iti vacanāt |
sati hi kuḍye citrakarma iti nyāyādadhiṣṭhāne hi satyadhiṣṭheyasya pratiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati |

lg.l: prema nītaṃ prakarṣaṃ cet sa eṣa praṇayaḥ smṛtaḥ ||

p.s: paricayād udgāḍharāgodayāḥ nirvighnāccirakālābhyāsādatidṛḍharāgasya udaya udbhavo yāsām |

lg.l: rajyate dīpyate citte sa rāga iti kathyate ||

p.s:
kālenāvaraṇātyayāt pariṇate yat snehasāre sthitam |
iti uttararāmacaritoktavat |
tās tā iti tacchabdavīpsayā īrṣyāmānapraṇayamānādiśabalatvādaśakyavarṇanatvamanubhavaikagocaratvaṃ ca prakāśyate |

ratiraṅkuritā premṇā mānāt pallavitā bhavet |
sakorakā praṇayataḥ snehāt kusumitā bhavet ||
rāgāt phalavatī ceyamanurāgeṇa bhujyate ||
iti vacanāt |
mugdhadṛśa ity akṛtrimālokanasubhagatvaṃ dṛśoḥ prakāśyate, nisargamadhurāḥ svabhāvato hṛdyāḥ ceṣṭāḥ vāgaṅgasattvanirvṛttāḥ pravṛttiviśeṣāḥ |
nisargamadhurāś ceṣṭāḥ premārdratvādiviśiṣṭā mayi bhaveyur iti prārthanā |
mayi madviṣaye, antaḥkaraṇasya yugapad jñānānutpattiliṅgonneyatā dehābhyantaravartitvād jñānasādhanatvācca |
bāhyakaraṇavyāpārarodhī sthūladehāpekṣayā cakṣurādīnāmapyāntaratve ’pi manopekṣayā bahirvartanād bāhyāni, jñānakarmasādhanatvācca karaṇānīti tāni bāhyakaraṇānyucyante |

indriyāṇi parāṇyāhurindriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ |
bhagavadvacanāt,
sāmpratakālaṃ bāhyaṃ trikālamābhyantaraṃ karaṇam |
iti ca sāṅkhyokteḥ |
teṣāṃ vyāpārāḥ draṣṭavyādigrahaṇaṃ vaktavyādivyāptiśca, tān roddhuṃ nivārayituṃ śīlaṃ yasya |
anena manasaḥ sarvendriyasārathitvāt tallaye sarvendriyalaya iti prakāśyate |
āśaṃsāparikalpitāsu manorathaiḥ somaśarmapitṛvat paritaḥ kalpitāsu anubhūyamānatvena cintitāsvityarthaḥ |
ānandasāndraḥ sukhena bahala ity anena tīvraduḥkhajanitānmohādvyāvṛttiḥ |

tīvrābhiṣaṅgaprabhaveṇa vṛttiṃ mohena saṃstambhayatendriyāṇām |
ity ukteḥ |
tatra hetuḥ madgrathitā mayā gumphitā iti na punardravyagauravāt |
adhivāsaḥ surabhīkaraṇaṃ yasya sa cāsau prakṛtyā subhagaśca arpitaḥ cumbanaparirambhādiṣu niryantraṇaṃ dattaḥ stano yasmai |
karṇajāhaviniveśitānanaḥ karṇamūle svasya karṇapārśve viniveśitaṃ viśeṣeṇa nikṣiptaṃ mukhaṃ yasya |
tasya pākamūle pīlvādikarṇādibhyaḥ kuṇabjāhacau 5. 2. 24 iti jāhac |
priyayeti kartṛpadaṃ viniveśanakriyayā sākṣāt sambadhyate, arpaṇakriyayā tv arthāt |
tadaṅgaparivṛttiṃ tasyāḥ aṅgānāṃ mujalatayorūrvośca madīyairaṅgairvinimayaṃ tadaṅgasthāne madaṅgānāṃ madaṅgasthāne ca tadaṅgānāmavasthitiḥ |
śayanagatāvūruvyatyāsaṃ bhujavyatyāsaṃ ca kṛtvā sasaṅgharṣamiva yad ghanaṃ svajete tattilataṇḍulam iti vātsyāyanaḥ |
atrāpi vakṣyamāṇe tat paśyeyam ityatrāpyautsukyameva viṣayabhedādvyajyate |
atra premārdrāḥ ityādinā cirakālam avicchinnarasamuditoditaṃ priyāsamāgamasukhamāśaṃsitam |
avimuktetyādi tu tadalābhe ’pi jātucidyathābhilaṣitamupagūhanamanubhūya tadanantarameva maraṇamapi varamiti dyotitam || 8 ||
bhū prāptau iti dhātoḥ sampūrvāllyapi rūpam |
sambhūya kāntaiḥ pibanti iti vakṣyati ca |
eva na tatra saṃśaya ity arthaḥ |
sukhaṃ yadarthaṃ sarvaṃ yacca nānyārthaṃ tat sukham iti lakṣitam |
sukhānīti yataḥ kutaścit jātāni yāni yāvanti ceti bahuvacanena vyajyate |
anena yo vai bhūmā tatsukham iti śrutyantavākyamapyanusmārayati kaviḥ |
ālokapathāvatāriṇi darśanasya mārgaṃ gāhamāne, na tu samīpataḥ sphuṭaṃ dṛśyamāna iti |
anena lakṣyālakṣya iva dūrato dṛśyamāna iti dyotyate |
prasnauti pravarṣati, śreyaḥ parisnauti tanoti kīrtim | itivat |
samīpataḥ sphuṭamavalokanaṃ dūradarśananirvṛtasya manaso darpajanitāṃ naṭanādirūpāṃ krīḍāṃ karotīty arthaḥ |
ramu krīḍāyām iti dhātvarthāśrayaṇāt, na punaratra sthāyībhāvo ratirucyate |
tattve hetubhūtaṃ lokottaraṃ saundaryamāha bālendukaloccayād bālānāmapariṇatatvena mugdhalāvaṇyānāṃ candrakalānāmuccayādekatra saṅgrahādapādānāt |
apacitaśabdastvavivakṣitavācyena dhvaninā latābhyaḥ parigṛhītaiḥ puṣpairivetyarthaṃ vyañjayati, suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīṃ cinvanti puruṣāstrayaḥ | itivat |
utpāditaṃ sṛṣṭamiva, na punaḥ karpūradravairiva viliptam |
devatāgārādike maṅgalasthāne svasamṛddhyarthamādareṇa janaḥ satataṃ yathā sannidhatte tathāsminnaṅga ity arthaḥ |
bhūyo ’pi punarapīti pūrvadarśanena tṛṣṇāyā aśāntiḥ pratipādyate |
tasyā iti yā tathāvidhānurāgavivaśatayānubhūtā tasyā ity arthaḥ |
atra pūrvārdhe eveti pāṭhe atiśayoktiḥ, iveti pāṭhe tūtprekṣālaṅkāraḥ |
ataḥ prārthanātrayaṃ mahāmāṃsavikrayaniṣkrayatvena devatāḥ prati yuktam iti ca veditavyam || 9 ||
atha paśyeyamiti kṛtāṃ darśanāśaṃsāmākṣipanniva bhaṅgyā cetasastadekāśrayatvamāha—athaveti |
neti tadabhāvaḥ kathyate, vṛṣatā klībatā jñānam ajñānaṃ jīvitaṃ na vā | iti vāhaṭoktavat |
iti anayoḥ prakārayoḥ svalpo viśeṣaḥ laghīyān bhedaḥ |
sātiśayena vyāvṛttena prāktanena pūrvaṃ jātenopalambhenārthāt priyatamāviṣayeṇa jñānena sambhāvitātmanaḥ samyagutpāditasvarūpasya |
saṃskārasya svotpādakasajātīyotpādakastadvijātīyo guṇaḥ saṃskāraḥ tasya, arthād bhāvanārūpasya |
tadvisadṛśaiḥ tacchabdena santānaḥ parāmṛśyate tasya svabhāvānyatvena viruddhaiḥ |
pratyayāntarair aham idamādibhir jñānaviśeṣair ghaṭajñānasantāna iva ghaṭapaṭādipratyayaiḥ |
priyatamāsmṛtipratyayotpattisantānaḥ prāṇasamāviṣayasya smṛtirūpasya jñānasya bhāvanāsaṃskārajanyajñānatvāt smṛteḥ utpattisantānaḥ udayasyāvicchedaḥ sā sā setyevaṃrūpaḥ |
vṛttisārūpyataḥ vṛttyā buddhivṛttirūpeṇa jñānena samānarūpatayā ekākāratayetyarthaḥ |

ayam arthaḥ—buddhivṛttyātmakasya priyāsmṛtipratyayasantānasya caitanyaikākāratayodayamānasyādhyānaparyāyasya ātmacaitanyaikyamāpadya vilayānnirbhedasvarūpaśūnyamivānandānubhavamātramavasthānaṃ samādhisaṃjñitaṃ sampadyata iti |

tathā cāhur abhiyuktāḥ—
viruddhairaviruddhairvā bhāvairvicchidyate na yaḥ |
ātmabhāvaṃ nayatyanyān sa sthāyī lavaṇākaraḥ ||
iti |
atra ca yogavedāntaśāstrasarvapathīnena kavinā tadartho vicchittyā prakāśyate iti mantavyam |

tathā hi—niratiśayetyādinā yamādipañcāṅgīniṣpannatvamucyate, saṃskārasya iti dhāraṇā, pratāyamāna iti dhāraṇāntaṣaḍaṅgīsambhṛtatvam, tadvisadṛśairityādinā dhyānaṃ vijātīyapratyayānantaritasajātīyapratyayapravāhakaraṇaṃ nididhyāsanam iti, yogaśāstre lakṣitatvāt,
tadrūpapratyayaikāntasantatiś cānyaniḥspṛhā |
tad dhyānaṃ prathamairaṅgaiṣṣaḍbhirniṣpādyate nṛpa ||
iti śrīviṣṇupurāṇavacanāc ca |

tasyaiva kalpanāhīnaṃ svarūpagrahaṇaṃ hi yat |
manasā dhyānaniṣpādyaḥ samādhiḥ so'bhidhīyate ||
iti,
ātmabhāvaṃ nayatyenaṃ tadbrahmadhyāyinaṃ mune |
vikāryamātmanaḥ śaktyā lohamākarṣako yathā ||
iti ca śrīviṣṇupurāṇokteḥ |

sarvavyāpini cinmātre śive svaikyena bhāvanā |
avicchedena satataṃ samādhiḥ paramo mataḥ ||
iti gurudevaḥ |

vṛttisārūpyata iti idamanidaṃrūpādahaṃkārānmuñjādiṣīkāmivānidamaṃśaṃ caitanyarūpaṃ niṣkṛṣya śrutyā cācāryaprasādādahaṃ brahmāsmīti jñānena vidyākhyena buddhivṛttirūpeṇābhyastenaikākāratayā samastabhedabādhanād brahmātmatvānubhūtiḥ prabodhākhyā jāyate ityadvaitasiddhāntaṃ pratipādayannātmanastadabhirucimāsūtrayati |
līneva yataḥ kutaścid bhiyā hiyā vāpavarakasthānīye cetasyanupraviśya saṃśliṣṭevetyarthaḥ |
sitāravindapracayeṣu līnāḥ, divākarādrakṣati yo guhāsu līnam, tiraścakāra bhramarābhilīnayoḥ ityādiṣu līnaśabdasya saṃyogasambandhamātravācakatvāvagamāt |
athavā vyāpakasya bāhyasya vastunaḥ kathamaṇumātre'ntaḥ praveśa ityāśaṅkyāha—pratibimbiteva mukurāyamāṇe tasmiṃśchāyātmanānupraviṣṭeveti |

pratibimbapraveśasyāvāstavatve ’pi, chāyāmivādarśatalaṃ praviṣṭām |, mukhamindurujjvalakapolamataḥ pratimācchalena sudṛśāmaviśat |, boḷantiapecchantapaḍimāsakantadhavaḷaghaṇasaṅgho | ityādiṣu tatpraveśaprasiddher evam uktiḥ |
bimbamukurayoranyatarāpāye pratibimbāpāyamāśaṅkyāha—likhiteva phalakāyite tasmin varṇaistūlikayā nirmiteveti |
salilādiviruddhopanipātāttadvināśamāśaṅkyāha—utkīrṇarūpeva stambhakalpe tasminniśitaṭaṅkatakṣaṇenākāriteveti, yaḥ kṣatradehaṃ paritakṣya ṭaṅkaistapomayairbrāhmaṇamuccakāra | iti murāryuktavat |

stambheṣu yoṣitpratiyātanānām utkrāntavarṇakramadhūsarāṇām |
ityuktanyāyena kālavaśāttatrā ’pi vaivarṇyādikamāśaṅkyāha—pratyupteva kanakarucasadṛśe tasmin māṇikyādivat sākṣādeva kṣepaṇena sthāpiteva |

anargharatnapratyuptakāñcīyutanitambinīm | tasyollasatkāñcanakuṇḍalāgrapratyuptagārutmataratnabhāsā | pratyuptaḥ padmarāgeṇa prabhāmaṇḍalabandhinā | ityādiprayogeṣu prativāpasya ratnanikṣepaviṣayatvena darśanāt |
tatrāpi kṣepaṇavaśādasamagradarśanatvamāśaṃkyāha—vajralepaghaṭiteva pīṭhadeśīye tasmin devatāpratimādivad vajralepākhyenauṣadhena dṛḍhaṃ śleṣiteveti |

lākṣāsarjarasaḥ śaṅkhaḥ sikatā triphalārasaḥ |
kunduruṣkaṃ ca saṃpiṣṭaṃ vajralepo ’yamīritaḥ ||
iti siddhāntasārokteḥ |
tatrāpi kālavaśād bandhaśaithilyena calanamāśaṅkyāha—antarnikhāteva kṣititalatulite tasmin nidhānādivadavadāryābhyantare nihiteveti |

anayā pūrvapūrvākāṃkṣānivāritayotprekṣāśṛṅkhalayā antaḥpraviṣṭaiva niravagamaiva nirnāśaivāmlānalāvaṇyaiva samagradarśanaiva kṣaṇamapyacalitaiva priyā cetasi lagnetyatiśayito'rthaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayahārī samarpyate |
utkīrṇarūpetyatra samāsasya sambandhisandhāyitvāt sambandhasya siddhadharmatvena guṇatve ’pi utkiraṇakriyāyā atra prādhānyena vivakṣitatvāt kriyotprekṣaiveti mantavyam |
kīlitā kīlaḥ aṇiḥ kavāṭatulye tasmin kanakapaṭṭikāvat sañjātakīlaṃ kṛteva |
viśikhaiḥ śaraiḥ cetobhuvaḥ cittajanmanaḥ, saṅkalpayonitvāt kāmasya |
pañcabhir iti prasiddhāyā api saṃkhyāyā grahaṇaṃ pañcāṅgyāmāhatairaṇibhūtaiḥ kīlanaṃ prakāśayati |

cintāsantatitantujālanibiḍasyūteva cintāyā anudhyānasya pravāhaścintāsantatiḥ saiva tantujālaṃ sūtrasamūhaḥ sūkṣmāyatatvāt tena nibiḍaṃ suśliṣṭaṃ yathā tathā syūtā nunnā sūcīmukhaniveśitena tantujālena paṭe paṭāntaravaccintāsantatyā syūteva |
tu hi ca smaha vai pādapūraṇe iti vacanāt |
yata eva lagnā, atas tanmayam iva karoti |
tataś ca sandarśanatadabhāvayoḥ svalpo viśeṣa iti pūrvapūrvasyottarottaro hetutvenopāttaḥ |
tataś ca sandarśanaprāyeṇa saṅkalpasamāgamena, kiñcid āvegaśāntiḥ prakāśyate |
ajja kasaṇacaüddasi tti ityuktatvāt, kasaṇacaüddasie mahāmasāṇe iti vakṣyamāṇatvāc ca |

tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā |
iti śrīviṣṇupurāṇavacanāt |
pravardhamānabalenāvāryamāṇaḥ pravartamānaḥ sañcaritum ārabhamāṇaḥ kauṇapānāṃ śavāśanānāṃ rakṣaḥpiśācānāmityarthaḥ |
paryantapratirodhi samīpadeśāvārakaṃ meduradhanastyānaṃ salilabharitatayā sāndrasnigdhaśyāmalo megha iva saṃhatam |
styānaṃ styai ṣṭyai saṃghātaśabdayoḥ ity asmā nniṣṭhā |
parabhāgaḥ guṇotkarṣaḥ parabhāgo guṇotkarṣaḥ iti vaijayantī |
ata āha—saṃsaktākulakelayaḥ saṃsaktāḥ prasaktāḥ ākulāḥ sambhramaviśiṣṭāḥ eko'nyamabhidhāvati, anyo ’paramākarṣati, aparaḥ parasmin patatītyevamādiprakārasaṃkulā ity arthaḥ kalayaḥ krīḍāḥ yaiḥ |

kilikilākolāhalaiḥ kilikileti nīcajanmanāṃ harṣaśabdānukāraḥ, “tataḥ kilikilāyante” iti śrīrāmāyaṇe vānaraviṣayatvenokteḥ tadrūpaiḥ kolāhalaiḥ kalakalaiḥ sammadāt pramadasammadau harṣe 3-3-68 iti nipātanāt sammado harṣaḥ, tato hetoḥ |

vāntāgnyulkāmukhaḥ preto vipro bhavati vicyutaḥ |
amedhyakuṇapāśī tu kṣattriyaḥ kaṭapūtanaḥ ||
iti manuvacanāc ca |

ḍākinyo yātudhānyaśca kūśmāṇḍā ye ’rbhakagrahāḥ |
bhūtapretapiśācāśca yakṣarakṣovināyakāḥ ||
ityādayaḥ purāṇapaṭhitāḥ |
bho bho! he bhavantaḥ śmaśānaniketanāḥ pitṛvanam āvāso yeṣām |
svahastadhṛtena śastreṇa khaḍgena khaṇḍitatvāt pūtena śuddhena |
gobrāhmaṇārthe śastrapūtāntarātmā hataḥ saṃgrāme kṣattriyaḥ svargam eti | iti tava prayāto yamyatvaṃ śastrapūto bravīmi te | ityādimahābhāratādivacaneṣu śastrapātasya pāpaharatvāvagamāt pūtatvoktiḥ |
tadartham eva ca kṛpāṇapāṇir iti śastradhāraṇoktiḥ |
tataḥ pūrvaṃ paścāc ca śastradhāraṇasya prasaṅgābhāvāt |
aśastrapūteti tu pāṭhe pūtatvaniṣedhād apūtatvavidher viruddhatvaṃ sphuṭam eva |
nirvyājena ṣaṇḍarogādidagdhavraṇitatvādidoṣarahitasya puruṣasyāṅgena manuṣyasya medhyāvayavenopakalpitaṃ yuṣmadarthe saṃskṛtam |
āghoṣaṇā uccair ghuṣṭaṃ tadanantaram eva samuccaratā samantād udgacchatā tumulena saṅkulenāta evāvyaktenāsphuṭākṣareṇa kalakalenākulaḥ saṃkṣobhitaḥ |
tatra hetuḥ āvirbhavadbhūtasaṅkaṭaḥ pratyakṣībhavadbhūtasaṅkaṭaḥ pramathairnibiḍa iti tanmūlena bhūkampena |

athavā—
āsumbhantajalaṭṭhiakaïvaḷavaḷantāloaṃ |
dīsaï bhamantavihaḍhaṃ thāṇapphiḍiaḍiḍhilaṃ paḍantaṃ va ṇahaṃ ||
4.54 iti setūktanyāyena bhūtasambhramalakṣyālakṣyasvarūpatayā kaḷakaḷaiś ca pracalita ivetyutprekṣā |

samīpanikaṭābhyarṇābhyagrābhyāśāntimā bhuvaḥ |
ete śabdāḥ samīpādyā dharme klī tadvati triṣu ||
iti vaijayantī |
vikaṭaṃ ca virūpaṃ syāt iti vaijayantī |

madhyadantā rājadantā daṃṣṭrā tatpārśvayordvayoḥ |
iti vaijayantī |
dhāvadbhiriti mukhaviśeṣaṇatvenoktiḥ śarīrāṇāṃ kvacidavasthāne ’pi kandharāṇāṃ tu dairghyātteṣāṃ digantabhrāntiṃ prakāśayitum |

vidyutpuñjanikāśakeśanayanabhrūśmaśrujālaiḥ vidyutpuñjanikāśāni taṭitsamūhavat kapilavarṇāni, keśānāṃ śirasyabālānāṃ nayanānām netrāṇāṃ bhrūṇām taduparilomapāḷīnāṃ śmaśrūṇāṃ cibukaromṇāṃ ca jālāni yeṣām |

nikāśādyāstu sāmyārthāḥ same syuḥ śabdataḥ parāḥ |
iti vaijayantī |
lakṣyāṇi dīrghākāratvād alakṣyāṇi viśuṣkatayā sūkṣmatvācca vapūṃṣi śarīrāṇi yeṣām |

ulkāmukhānām u(nmu? lmu)kalakṣaṇā jvālā yeṣāṃ mukhe te ulkāmukhā iti piśācaviśeṣāḥ
jvalanmukholkāvicitāmiṣābhiḥ saṃvāhyate rājapathaḥ śivābhiḥ | iti yathā kroṣṭuviśeṣāḥ |
